wikipedia_page.main: Thomas A. Kenneth Laidlaw (born 16 March 1936) is a retired Scottish professional cyclist. With Robert Millar and David Millar, he is one of only three Scots to finish the Tour de France. He is also one of the first British riders to finish the Tour.
